text: Adger is an unincorporated community in Fairfield County, in the U.S. state of South Carolina. ==History== Adger was established in 1850, and took the name of the Adger family of settlers. A variant name is "Adgers". ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in South Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in Fairfield County, South Carolina
title: Adger, South Carolina
